To get the exact cost and details on where to buy a monthly bus pass in your city, I recommend the following steps:

1. **Visit your city's public transportation website**: Go to the website of your city's public transportation agency (e.g., [www.yourcitytransit.com](http://www.yourcitytransit.com)) and look for the "Fares" or "Passes" section.
2. **Check the transit agency's customer service**: You can also contact the transit agency's customer service department directly via phone or email to ask about the cost and availability of a monthly pass.
3. **Visit a transit center or sales outlet**: If you prefer to purchase a pass in person, visit a transit center or a authorized sales outlet in your city to get more information and buy a pass.

Some popular transit agencies' websites to get you started:

* New York City: [MTA.info](http://MTA.info)
* Los Angeles: [Metro.net](http://Metro.net)
* Chicago: [TransitChicago.com](http://TransitChicago.com)
* San Francisco: [SFMTA.com](http://SFMTA.com)
* Boston: [MBTA.com](http://MBTA.com)

Remember to check the website or contact the transit agency directly for the most up-to-date information on prices and purchasing options.
